entities.name: package
entities.description: A grubby little package wrapped up in brown paper lying on the floor of Vault seven hundred and thirteen.

entities.name: door
entities.description: The door to Vault seven hundred and thirteen.

relationships.description: Griphook has access to the vault, as he is able to melt away the door with his long fingers.
Hagrid pulls Harry back by the scruff of his neck when Harry tries to lean over the side of the underground ravine.
